Posts.EditableText: Hi guys. Just letting you know that the games for IntroComp are now live for voting, including my entry made in Quest, The Bafflingly Casual Adventures of No One of Significant Import. Have fun! http://www.allthingsjacq.com/introcomp/

Posts.EditableText: In light of an email sent to the authors of this comp, I must clarify that the rules state your vote should reflect how much you want the author to finish the game, not necessarily how much you like the author/game/genre.
